actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 10 of title 37, United States Code, to authorize certain travel and transportation allowances to members of the uniformed services incapacitated by illness.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of travel and transportation allowances to members of the uniformed services incapacitated by illness. (Amends 37 U.S.C. 554)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 10 of title 37, United States Code, to authorize certain travel and transportation allowances to members of the uniformed services incapacitated by illness.
